meanings.definition: An open colonnade surrounding a courtyard or garden.
meanings.sent1: The peristyle in the garden provided a shady spot to relax.
meanings.sent2: The ancient temple had a beautiful peristyle around its courtyard.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels used the peristyle as a playground, swinging from column to column.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the peristyle, filling the space with joy.
meanings.sent5: The vines climbing the peristyle created a magical green tunnel.

meanings.definition: A series of columns surrounding a building or structure.
meanings.sent1: The peristyle of the mansion was grand and imposing.
meanings.sent2: The peristyle of the library added a touch of elegance to the architecture.
meanings.sent3: The peristyle columns played hide and seek with the sunlight throughout the day.
meanings.sent4: The peristyle stood like a protective shield around the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent5: The marble columns of the peristyle gleamed in the moonlight, casting long shadows.
